name: Reaper Run
description:
It's easy.

A & D to move, click on the buffs to gain them. Cheese gives you a heart. Bubbles protect you for 5 seconds. Black projectiles give you a blackout. 

Survive to get to heaven.

Begin by clicking the big "Start" Button.
Refresh To restart.

-------------------------------------------------------

The game was made in scratch in 72 hours and was made by me alone.
Made for the SoloDevelopment Winter Jam

I hope you enjoy the game! Make sure to rate it!
